roleset.name: to move slowly or aimlessly
roleset.note: PUTTER-V NOTES: frame by Perryn (from putter.01-v)

example.name: actually nominal
example.text: Former President Bill Clinton spent a quiet Monday in New York City suburbs today, and if he's-1 at all unnerved about *PRO*-1 going from *PRO*-1 being the most powerful person on earth to *PRO*-1 puttering around in Chappaqua, New York, he's not showing it.
